artist: Delineator: Jean-Baptiste Le Prince; Engraver: Pierre Michel Alix
description: coastal landscape; rocky shore at right; a beggar seated at bottom of cliff far right; nearby a man saddles two horses harnessed to a sleigh; 3 men converse around a banister; city at top of cliff; at left, the sea
inscription:
Signature, and Inscriptions

on sheet: 53 / Le Prince del.   Alix Sculp. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 53
title: Coastal Landscape
